member.name: T:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver
member.summary: Provides actions to resolve application dependencies

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.Resolve``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a service from the DI container
member.typeparam: The type to which the result will be cast
member.returns: The component instance that provides the service

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.ResolveKeyed``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a service from the DI container by a key
member.typeparam: The type to which the result will be cast
member.param: The first argument is a key of the service. Other argument are constructor arguments
member.returns: The component instance that provides the service

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.ResolveNamed``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a service from the DI container by the first appearance of a name from the names parameter
member.typeparam: The type to which the result will be cast
member.param: Collection of names to retrieve a service by
member.returns: The component instance that provides the service

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.ResolveAll``1
member.summary: Retrieves all implementations of a service from the DI container
member.typeparam: The type to which the result will be cast
member.returns: The collection of the service instances

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.ResolveAllKeyed``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves all implementations of a service from the DI container by a key
member.typeparam: The type to which the result will be cast
member.param: The key to retrieve a service by
member.returns: The collection of the service instances

member.name: M:Urkin.DependencyInjection.IDependenciesResolver.ResolveAllNamed``1(System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieves all implementations of a service from the DI container by the first appearance of a name from the names parameter
member.typeparam: The type to which the service will be cast
member.param: Collection of names to retrieve a service by
member.returns: The collection of the service instances
